modName: Nchuzzrezar - a dwemer mansion - Chinese Translation
summary: This is the Chinese translated version of the original Nchuzzrezar.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Chinese translated version of the original Nchuzzrezar. 
Original page:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9541
All credit to the original author crgobi.

Introduction
An elegant Dwemer-style player mansion nestled in a mountain valley within the Falkreath Hold region. Features a wide variety of buyable decorations and a completely original floorplan. All crafting stations, a pool and hot tub, lots of display options for your gear, a library with space for hundreds of books and a fungus garden in true Blackreach style. Now with a fun new dungeon, complete with a room upgrade reward and interesting new loot. It all begins by speaking to the mysterious dwemer automaton in the ruins of Nchuzzrezar. (map marker starts as visible, West of Lake Klinalth). 

For more information, please refer to the original mod, or read the Chinesized instruction.


Installation
This is only a Chinese .esp file , please go to original page to download the main file.
Please use the NMM to install the MOD.

Credit
All credit with crgobi, thank him for this great MOD!

If you like this MOD, please endorse the author, thank you!

About our group
ARROW&KNEE MOD TEAMâ„¢ is a neutral independent mini-group for Original MOD lovers,if you have ability to use some specialized software such as PS,max,nifskope,mudbox,zb,maya and so on , please contact us.
Our contact information: skyrimmodteam@gmail.com
OR, you can directly PM me here.
author: crgobi
